function addTestToUpaAbzTesting(upaAbtestingData, testName) {
upaAbtestingData = upaAbtestingData || '';
if (upaAbtestingData.length > 0) {
upaAbtestingData += '|';
}
upaAbtestingData += testName;
var parameters = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 2);
while (parameters.length > 0) {
upaAbtestingData += '|' + parameters[0] + '_' + parameters[1].replace(/_/g, '-');
parameters = parameters.slice(2);
}
return upaAbtestingData;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
function addUrlParameters(url, parameters) {
for (var key in parameters) {
var value = parameters[key];
if (value != null) {
if (url.indexOf("=") > 0) {
url += "&";
}
url += key + "=" + value;
}
}
return url;
}
function fillSearchUrl(url, parametersOverride, stepIndex) {
if (url.indexOf("?") < 0) {
url += '?';
}
var parameters = $.extend(true, {}, flightsOptions.searchQuery);
if (flightsOptions.stepsOptions != null && stepIndex != null) {
parameters = $.extend(true, parameters, flightsOptions.stepsOptions[stepIndex]);
}
parameters = $.extend(true, parameters, parametersOverride);
url = addUrlParameters(url, parameters);
return url;
}
function loadCSS(href) {
var cssLink = $("<link>");
$("head").append(cssLink); //IE hack: append before setting href
cssLink.attr({
rel: "stylesheet",
type: "text/css",
href: href
});
};
</script>
<script>
var resultsDeferred = $.Deferred();
var resultsInitializedDeferred = $.Deferred();

var streamedSearchAjax = null;
var resultsAjaxFinished = false;
var ajaxTimes = {};
var flightsHeaders = {'X-TrackingCode': 'DEF', 'X-Gui-Version': 'DEF'};
function setAjaxTimes(result, final) {
if (ajaxTimes.firstClusterAjax == null) {
ajaxTimes.firstClusterAjax = new Date().getTime() - window.performance.timing.fetchStart;
}
if (final) {
ajaxTimes.allClustersAjax = new Date().getTime() - window.performance.timing.fetchStart;
}
if (result != null && result.times != null) {
$.extend(result.times, ajaxTimes);
}
}
var sessionItem = window.sessionStorage.getItem("flights-gui");
if (sessionItem != null) {
var historyData = JSON.parse(sessionItem).history;
if (historyData != null && historyData.searchQuery != null && historyData.searchQuery.currency != null) {
flightsOptions.searchQuery.currency = historyData.searchQuery.currency;
}
}
ajaxTimes.beginAjax = new Date().getTime() - window.performance.timing.fetchStart;
var firstSearchUrl = fillSearchUrl('/shop/flights-busquets/api/v1/web/search', null, 0);
var headers = {"X-UOW": 'results-02-1624508330690', "X-RequestId": 'CEiku2vcNi', "X-REFERRER": document.referrer};

flightsHeaders = flightsOptions.flightsHeaders;
}

headers['XDESP-FORCED-HIGHLIGHT']=sessionStorage.getItem('XDESP-FORCED-HIGHLIGHT');
sessionStorage.removeItem('XDESP-FORCED-HIGHLIGHT');
}

Object.assign(headers, flightsOptions.frontHeaders);
}

url : firstSearchUrl,
type : 'GET',
dataType: 'json',

success : function(response, status) {
setAjaxTimes(response, true);
if (response.urlLandingForced) {
flightsOptions.disambiguationType = 'CHEAPEST';
window.location = response.urlLandingForced;
}else {
resultsDeferred.resolve(response);
}
},
error : function(response) {
resultsDeferred.reject();
}
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var buyBtnClicked = false;
window.onbeforeunload = function() {
if (!(resultsAjaxFinished || buyBtnClicked)) {
try {
// si se esta yendo de la pagina y no se oculto la barra de progreso
if (flightsServices != null && flightsOptions != null && flightsOptions.disambiguationType == null) {
var progressBarCondition = $('.progress-bar-background').length >= 1;
if (progressBarCondition) {
// si se esta yendo de la pagina y no se oculto el skeleton
//var skeletonCondition = $('.-eva-3-skeleton').length >= 1;
//if (skeletonCondition) {
var data = {
channel : flightsOptions.searchQuery.channel || '',
countryCode : flightsOptions.countryCode || '',

routeType : flightsOptions.routeType || '',
flow : flightsOptions.flow || '',
uow : flightsOptions.uow || '',
appVersion : flightsOptions.appVersion || '',
abandonment : new Date().getTime() - window.performance.timing.fetchStart || '',
userAgent : navigator.userAgent || '',
url : window.location.toString() || '',
ab : flightsOptions.abTestingString || '',
stepNum : flightsOptions.stepNum || '',
user : flightsOptions.searchQuery && flightsOptions.searchQuery.user || '',
clientType : flightsOptions.clientType || '',
mobileVersion : flightsOptions.mobileVersion || '',
fallbackRedirect : window.location.search.indexOf('fallback')>0 ? Utils.getUrlParameter('xlc') : '',

to : flightsOptions.searchQuery && flightsOptions.searchQuery.to || ''
};
sendBeacon(flightsServices.recordCustomEvent.replace("{event}", "shoppingFlightsLoad")
.replace("{channel}", flightsOptions.searchQuery.channel)
.replace("{clientType}", flightsOptions.clientType), data);
}
}
} catch(e) {}
return "¿Estás seguro que quieres abandonar esta página? Se perderán los datos ingresados.";
}
};

<script>
amplify.subscribe("renderItemsFinished", function () {
var skeletonLoader = $('#skeleton-loader');
if(skeletonLoader.length > 0){
skeletonLoader.remove();
$('.sbox-skeleton').remove();
$('.landing-fast-filters-skeleton').remove();
$('.main-content, .results-research-container').addClass('-show');
setTimeout(function() {
$(".skeleton-component").remove();
}, 15000);
}
});
amplify.subscribe("showResultsErrorMessage", skeletonErrorHandler);
amplify.subscribe("noResults", skeletonErrorHandler);
function skeletonErrorHandler(){
var loader = $('#skeleton-loader');
if(loader.length > 0) {
loader.remove();
$(".skeleton-component").remove();
$(".main-content, .results-research-container").addClass("-show");
}
}
</script>
